comment.author: 90848035@N00
comment._content: I don't know what they were doing here, but it sure looks like fun. And maybe a little mischief.  ;-)

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
It is interesting to note that the alumni of the Class of 1909 at Princeton University also were costumed as a deck of playing cards, during 1914 Class Day activities at Princeton, New Jersey:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5558110623/in/photostream/]
